meanings.sent1: The onomastician researched the origins of different names.

meanings.definition: Someone who specializes in the study of names.

meanings.sent5: The onomastician's dedication to names was unwavering.

meanings.definition: An expert in the field of onomastics.
meanings.sent1: The onomastician's knowledge was sought after by many seeking name advice.
